def print_hello(name):
    print(f'Hello {name}')

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.DataFrame({
    'x': np.random.normal(size=100),
    'y': np.random.normal(size=100)
})

df.head()
x y

plt.scatter(df['x'], df['y'])
